page.title: 20CREDITS FOR CROSTON SURVEY
page.content: This Doomsday Survey was manily the work of staff and pupils of the{Bishop {Rawstorne C.E. High School,}with some assistance from the{St. Michaels C.E. {Primary School}and the{Croston {Methodist Primary School.}Secondary school pupils involved in the work were selected from second year groups and the survey was organised by a joint team from the Humanities and English Departments. The information was assembled on disc by staff of the Computer Studies Department at the Bishop Rawstorne School.
